item.title: 警方称，一群戴着 "深色面具 "的枪手在加利福尼亚州国王城一栋房子的派对外开火，造成 4 人死亡。
item.description:
A group of gunmen in "dark-colored masks" opened fire outside a party at a house in King City, California, killing 4, police say. https://t.co/mQfwPtjVi1 pic.twitter.com/lZgItmpFKx

item.title: 哈佛大学最近的一项研究显示，房租成本造成的负担比以往任何时候都重，这正式反映了全国租房者面临的严峻现实。
item.description:
More Americans are burdened by the cost of rent than ever before, according to a recent Harvard study, officially capturing the grim reality facing renters nationwide. https://t.co/ZyTSGzSMQD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在举家准备出发去春游的时候，一段关于一名妇女在飞机上争夺窗帘的新视频引发了关于旅客舒适度和礼貌的新问题。
item.description:
As families get set to take off for spring break, a new video of a woman battling over a window shade on a plane has sparked a new question about comfort and courtesy for travelers. https://t.co/6wTndLL6mP

item.title: 美国食品及药物管理局宣布，某些含有全氟和多氟烷基物质（或称 PFAS）的防油脂材料 "在美国不再出售用于食品包装"。
item.description:
Certain grease-proofing materials containing per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances, or PFAS, "are no longer being sold for use in food packaging in the U.S," the FDA announced. https://t.co/HliOxBb80j

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 四名宇航员于周日飞往国际空间站，他们将在为期六个月的逗留期间监督两艘新火箭飞船的抵达。
item.description:
Four astronauts blasted off for the International Space Station on Sunday where they will oversee the arrivals of two new rocketships during their six-month stint.https://t.co/KUiuAXcXKF pic.twitter.com/KliyoPiaf1

item.title: 米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）作为参议院共和党领袖的继任者必须能够 "坚持自己的立场"，参议员迈克-劳兹（Mike Rounds）在 @ThisWeekABC 节目中说道。
item.description:

item.title: 参议员克里斯-墨菲（Chris Murphy）敦促乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统和他的民主党同僚们在移民和边境问题上 "进攻"，因为在他的帮助下谈判达成的两党边境协议遭到了共和党人的阻挠。
item.description:
Sen. Chris Murphy is urging President Joe Biden and his fellow Democrats to "go on the offense" on immigration and the border after a bipartisan border deal he helped negotiate was tanked by Republicans. https://t.co/fwy5k3KaXE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 世界中央厨房（World Central Kitchen）的厨师兼人道主义者何塞-安德烈斯（José Andrés）回击了对空投加沙的批评，他对 @JonKarl 说："我们需要大胆。
item.description:
Chef and humanitarian José Andrés of World Central Kitchen pushes back against criticism of airdrops into Gaza, telling @JonKarl that "we need to be bold."

"If anything, we should be applauding any initiative that brings food into Gaza.” https://t.co/yfjpulPEB9 pic.twitter.com/FROKyKNYf2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 上周末，俄亥俄州州际公路上的司机们遇到了一个不同寻常的交通隐患--一对警马逆行。

item.title: 减少工作时间是否能提高公司的整体生产率？在 61 家公司选择参与每周四天工作制试点研究一年后，89% 的公司选择保留这一结构。
item.description:
Do fewer working hours boost a company's overall productivity?

One year after 61 companies opted to participate in a four-day week pilot study, 89% of the companies are opting to keep the structure in place. https://t.co/QCu67T3A1Z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 无人居住的费尔南迪纳岛上的拉昆布雷火山于周六午夜左右开始喷发，官方称这可能是自 2017 年以来最大的一次喷发。
item.description:
The La Cumbre volcano on the uninhabited Fernandina island began erupting Saturday around midnight in what officials said could be its largest eruption since 2017.https://t.co/h6Fa1gwq5P pic.twitter.com/ZNGhqZAzRm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 周日，欧亚鹰鸮弗拉科（Flaco）的追悼会吸引了数百名粉丝，其中包括讴歌这种顶级掠食者的演讲者。
item.description:
A memorial service for Flaco, the Eurasian eagle owl who escaped from his vandalized enclosure at the Central Park Zoo and spent more than a year as a wild bird, drew several hundred fans on Sunday, including speakers who eulogized the apex predator.https://t.co/6jA28ghDNK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 最高法院表示，周一将就各州根据第 14 修正案第 3 条将前总统唐纳德-特朗普从选票中删除的能力发表一份或多份意见。
item.description:
The Supreme Court says it will release one or more opinions on Monday over states' ability to remove former President Donald Trump from the ballot under Section 3 of the 14th Amendment.https://t.co/CyIbZyh0zf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 上周末，犹他州南乔丹市被强风卷走了一片风滚草，居民们正在清理。
item.description:
Residents are cleaning up after strong winds led to a tumbleweed takeover in South Jordan, Utah, over the weekend. pic.twitter.com/a3CJJLTAvi

item.title: 据美国广播公司（ABC News）报道，南卡罗来纳州前州长尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）预计将在周日赢得华盛顿特区共和党初选，这是她首次在初选中战胜前总统唐纳德-特朗普。
item.description:
BREAKING: Former South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley is projected to win Washington, D.C.'s Republican primary on Sunday, ABC News reports, her first primary win over former President Donald Trump.https://t.co/ROR3sVAd1h pic.twitter.com/YAbbEIXBLC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 新的数据显示，南非的犀牛偷猎活动呈上升趋势，去年该地区有近 500 头犀牛被猎杀。
item.description:
Rhino poaching are on the rise in South Africa, as nearly 500 rhinos were killed in the area last year, new figures show. https://t.co/0OgDXuhDZt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 自里约热内卢在登革热爆发后宣布进入公共卫生紧急状态以来，该市已加强了检测能力，开设了十几家登革热医疗中心，并对医务人员进行了培训，以满足不断增长的人口需求。
item.description:
Since Rio de Janeiro declared a public health emergency after an outbreak of dengue fever, the city has ramped up testing capacities, opened up a dozen dengue health centers and trained medical staff to attend to the ever-growing needs of its population. https://t.co/tM91VC7tjM

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 上个月，一名男子在澳大利亚试图抢劫一家酒类专卖店后被捕。监控录像显示，嫌疑人威胁店主并试图偷走收银机，随后附近的旁观者上前制止了他。
item.description:
A man was arrested after he attempted to rob a liquor store in Australia last month.
